name: Goblins & Goalposts
description:
A simple sports sim with spells, skeletons, and subterfuge. It's quite literally fantasy football.

  • Manage a team through six rounds of the 'Gobsoc Gauntlet'
  • Simplified soccer: no pesky offside, corners, or even fouls to worry about
  • Buy and sell players on the transfer market
  • Earn extra gold with unnecessary showboating
  • Watch your players brutalize their opponents for no reason
  • Use your half-time team talk to cheat your way to victory
  • Star player killed mid-match? Ghosts can play too!
  • Random player generator with over 8 billion permutations

---

Inspired by my childhood love of Championship Manager and my adulthood love of Dungeons & Dragons. When you get down to it, the two aren't that different: they're both about analyzing stats and creating stories. You nurture a group of players, attempt to strategize, and then sit back and spectate as the whims of fate decide whether or not your head gets kicked off.

---

This is a beta release and my first game so please let me know when you inevitably find bugs or balance issues. Thanks.
